text: 18:10-11 Ua Me Ini 22:18; Ofa Gami 19:26; 19:31Ia uan otariba ko guivibav sogh ofaba tuer dakozim gisɨn avimɨn me tuan markɨ. Egh ia, ariaghirezir gumazamizibar duabar gavgavimɨn amodoghɨn gɨn otivamin bizibar gun mɨgeir arazim, ko kukunir gumaziba amir arazim, ko akar mogomebar gun mɨgeir arazim, ko akuzibagh amir arazim, ko akavsiabagh amir arazim, ko duar kuraba ko mɨgeir arazim, ko imezibagh amir arazim, ko gumazamizir ovengezibar duaba ko mɨgeir arazim, ia bar arazir kabar amuan markɨ.
